cards.rules_text:
Enchant artifact or creature
Enchanted permanent can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.

—Darth Vader[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{X}{X}{W}: Monstrosity X. [i](If this creature isn't monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)[/i]
When this creature becomes monstrous, create twice X 1/1 white Tusken creature tokens named Tusken Raider.

[i]“Sand people always ride single file to hide their numbers.”
—Ben Kenobi[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i](As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.)[/i]
When The Battle of Hoth enters, create a 1/1 white Rebel creature token and a 1/1 white Trooper creature token.

Yeah play that one song again.”

cards.rules_text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

cards.rules_text: Create three 1/1 white Trooper creature tokens.

cards.rules_text:
{2}{U}: Put a shield counter on this creature if it doesn't have one. Activate only once each turn and only if no counters were removed from this creature this turn. [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]
Repair 3 [i](When this creature dies, you may exile it with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)[/i]
Exile target creature you control. Return that card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Don't look at it as retreating, look at it as advancing in another direction.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Choose a color. You and up to one target creature you control gain hexproof from that color until end of turn. Scry 1.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The Force can heal the body, and the soul.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:

• That creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
• When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, you gain 5 life.
• Draw a card.
